thought: To craft a powered_rail, I need to first craft a stick. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one bamboo from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1
